key_risks: Intense competition from global and local players
controversies: Criticism for environmental footprint of non-biodegradable waste
Effectiveness and scalability of eco-friendly initiatives under scrutiny
environmental_issues: Challenges in achieving sustainability targets like reducing plastic waste and achieving a zero-carbon society
social_issues: Potential impact of supply chain disruptions on local communities
Regulatory compliance risks related to product formulations and labeling
governance_issues: Navigating diverse regulatory environments across countries
Ensuring effective oversight of sustainability initiatives by the ESG Committee
